This directory is for placing the CSVs of the indexes.

The CSV file for the LRLD season must be named indexesLRLD.csv ,
and the CSV file for the SRSD season must be named indexesSRSD.csv .

The files must be formatted as a simple list of indexes, each index in its own line.
The indexes must be ordered by division ID, from first to last.
Each index must be a number from between 0 and 1.
